origin: A slidebar is inserted in image window. Init slidebar value is 90, it means that only histogram cell greater than 9/100000.0 (23 pixels for an 512X512 pixels) will be display.
local: 在图像窗口中插入一个滑块。Init slidebar值为90，表示只显示大于9/100000.0（512X512像素为23像素）的直方图单元格。
